sentences.en: He recited Israeli losses during the war.
sentences.cn: 他又诉说以色列在战争中的损失.

sentences.en: His message was aimed at the undecided middle ground of Israeli politics.
sentences.cn: 他所传达的信息针对的是以色列政局中尚未表态的中间派。

sentences.en: In 1990, 200,000 Soviet Jews resettled on Israeli territory.
sentences.cn: 在1990年，20万名苏联犹太人在以色列重新定居。

sentences.en: In reality, Israeli forces were probing in both directions, north and south.
sentences.cn: 实际上当时以色列的部队正在向南北两个方向挺进.

sentences.en: Israeli officials say that message struck home.
sentences.cn: 以色列官员说这一信息切中了要害。

sentences.en: Israeli population centers would not remain immune indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 以色列的居民中心不会无限期地不受侵犯.

sentences.en: It was in effect to offer a variant to the Israeli disengagement proposal of 1971.
sentences.cn: 这实际上是以色列1971年曾经提过的脱离接触方案的翻版.

sentences.en: Linda Gradstein has this report from Jerusalem, which was cleared by an Israeli censor.
sentences.cn: 琳达·格拉德斯坦的这份报道来自耶路撒冷，它已经通过了以色列方面的审查。

sentences.en: My view was still colored by the consistent Israeli reports.
sentences.cn: 我的看法仍然摆脱不了以色列例行报告的影响.

sentences.en: Our information on Israeli intentions was sketchy.
sentences.cn: 我们得到的有关以色列意图的情报非常粗略.

sentences.en: The Israeli air force might bloody them and break the back of the offensive.
sentences.cn: 以色列空军就可以把他们打得头破血流,并且粉碎埃及投入这场攻势的主力.

sentences.en: The Israeli court has not yet ruled on the case.
sentences.cn: 以色列法院尚未对此案作出裁决。

sentences.en: The Israeli officers praised the fighting qualities of the Egyptian and Syrian armies.
sentences.cn: 以色列的军官赞扬埃及和叙利亚军队的战斗素质.

sentences.en: The Israeli reaction around the table was a mixture of relief , exultation, and resignation.
sentences.cn: 餐桌上以色列人的反应是复杂的,宽慰 、 欣喜又无可奈何.

sentences.en: The shooting happened near an Israeli settlement in the Jordan Valley.
sentences.cn: 射击发生在约旦谷的以色列定居点.

trans.tran_en: relating to Israel or its people
